alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Flagler; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued April 08 at 2:08PM EDT until April 11 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Significant coastal flooding possible. * WHERE...Southeast Georgia and Northeast Florida Beaches, and portions of St Johns river in eastern Duval county. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Flagler; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns
